title: New: BOYISH – Cupid
content: Since discovering Japan tweegaze outfit BOYISH earlier in the year, I’ve developed a real soft spot for the group. Their addictive, cutesy vocals and Pains Of Being Pure At Heart inspired guitar riffs coupled with a heavy dose of reverb makes Cupid a fantastic listen, and puts BOYISH at the forefront of a rapidly expanding independent Japanese music scene. Check out Cupid below, and grab a free download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
